name: Foxy In The Forest
description:
A fox searching for its cubs...

Can you get back to them using the powers of mother Gaia ?

Features

  • Metroidvania Platformer
  • Pixel art graphics
  • A special powerup
  • A small bush enemy (bit buggy, pun-unintended...)
  • 7 berry collectibles (for completitionists!)
  • Multiple obstacles to overcome
  • Music via computoser

Made for Metroidvania Month 16.
